summary: This bill, H.R. 4453, aims to amend Title 5 of the United States Code to include Parkinson's disease in the list of illnesses and diseases presumed to be caused by employment in fire protection activities. This would likely impact benefits and compensation for firefighters diagnosed with Parkinson's, presuming a causal link between their job and the disease. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on July 16, 2025.
